definition: a breed of horse/variant of 歡|欢[huan1]

to gather happily under one roof

sentences.english: It's said that the first Galliard was a Fianna.

sentences.english: I have to come out a blue, a moment dares not to stay a long while again, empty mountain birds' twitter fish .

sentences.english: It is said that he won't fall in love other girls except her .

sentences.english: The happy pleasure, leaves the pain, had the crazy children.

sentences.english: Lynx-Killer, Red Talons Galliard, howls softly.

sentences.english: They all laughed, but no one laughed as hard as my father did.
